rules:
    has-x-summary:
            :
            :
        message: API MUST have an one-liner #/info/x-summary field containing a brief description.
        description: The `#/info/x-summary` can be used to specify a brief, one-liner description of your API: this is very useful for catalog purposes (eg. this can be shown as your API subtitle in catalogs and developer portals). In OAS3.1 you can use the standard `#/info/summary` field.
        given: $
        severity: error
        recommended: true
        type: style
            :
            field: info.x-summary
            function: truthy
